Notes.Text:
This update for haproxy version 1.8.17 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-20615: Fixed a denial of service, triggered by mishandling the priority flag on 
short HEADERS frame in the HTTP/2 decoder (bsc#1121283)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Availability Extension 15

Vulnerabilities.Description: An out-of-bounds read issue was discovered in the HTTP/2 protocol decoder in HAProxy 1.8.x and 1.9.x through 1.9.0 which can result in a crash. The processing of the PRIORITY flag in a HEADERS frame requires 5 extra bytes, and while these bytes are skipped, the total frame length was not re-checked to make sure they were present in the frame.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Availability Extension 15:haproxy-1.8.17~git0.e89d25b2-3.9.1
